response.overview: Super Weed, a documentary revealing the science of marijuana, a plant containing 400 active chemicals and compounds that is one of the most widely-used illicit drugs in the world. Despite marijuana being illegal in most countries, the widely used drug is considered by scientists to be one of our most interesting plants. They also show you what is to believed to be the biggest if not one of the biggest grow op's in the UK. It was a old building that they had taken over and turned it in to 80! rooms with a total of 4,000 plants worth at least Â£1,000,000!
response.title: Super Weed
